prompts: Create a mystical water-type Pokemon that resembles a serpent with flowing fins.
Imagine a dragon-like creature with a smooth body and elegant tail, perfect for swimming.
Show me a Pokemon that embodies the grace of a dragon, with shimmering blue scales.
Design a serpentine Pokemon with a calming presence, floating elegantly through the water.
Give me a legendary dragon-type Pokemon with a serene expression and a long, flowing body.
Generate a water dragon Pokemon with soft curves and a tranquil personality.
Make a Pokemon that has a sleek design, combining elements of dragons and water creatures.
